text: Differential inhibition of <extra_id_0> Smad6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Smad7 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> on bone morphogenetic protein - and activin - mediated growth arrest and apoptosis in B cells .

<extra_id_0> Smad6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Smad7 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> prevent ligand - induced activation of signal-transducing Smad proteins in the transforming growth factor-beta family .

Here we demonstrate that both <extra_id_0> Smad6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Smad7 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> are <extra_id_0> human bone morphogenetic protein-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> hBMP-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) - inducible antagonists of <extra_id_0> hBMP-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - induced growth arrest and apoptosis in mouse B cell hybridoma HS-72 cells .

Moreover , we confirmed that the ectopic expressions of <extra_id_0> Smad6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Smad7 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> inhibited the <extra_id_0> hBMP-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - induced <extra_id_0> Smad1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> Smad5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> phosphorylation .

We previously reported that <extra_id_0> Smad7 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is an <extra_id_0> activin A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - inducible antagonist of <extra_id_0> activin A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - induced growth arrest and apoptosis in HS-72 cells .

Interestingly , although mRNA expression of <extra_id_0> Smad6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was induced by <extra_id_0> activin A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in HS-72 cells , <extra_id_0> Smad6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> showed no antagonistic effect on <extra_id_0> activin A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - induced growth arrest and apoptosis .

Moreover , we found that the ectopic expression of <extra_id_0> Smad7 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , but not <extra_id_0> Smad6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , inhibited the <extra_id_0> activin A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - induced <extra_id_0> Smad2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> phosphorylation in HS-72 cells .

Thus , <extra_id_0> Smad6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Smad7 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> exhibit differential inhibitory effects in <extra_id_0> bone morphogenetic protein-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - and <extra_id_0> activin A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - mediated signaling in B lineage cells .
